DOC.brief_summary: In trial , investigator analyze effect eight week CLA supplementation associate aerobic exercise body fat lipid profile obese woman .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim investigation analyze effect eight week CLA supplementation associate aerobic exercise body fat lipid profile obese woman . The investigator perform randomize , double-blinded placebo-controlled trial 28 obese woman receive 3.2 g/d CLA 4 g/d olive oil ( placebo group ) perform 8-week protocol aerobic exercise . Dietary intake ( food record ) , body fat ( DXA ) biochemical analysis ( blood sample ) assess intervention period .
DOC.criteria: Had sign symptom disease No orthopedic injury Must inactive moderately active ( defined perform type physical exercise less twice week ) Must nonsmoker Must free use ergogenic aid Had metabolic disorder chronic degenerative disease Not use drug therapy body mass loss . Had frequency training session 85 % total session
